name: Super Smash Burgers
address: 1082 Granville St, Vancouver, BC V6Z 1L5, Canada

hasMenuItem.name: Super Smash Burger
hasMenuItem.description: Get ready to indulge in the ultimate culinary experience with our Super Smash Burger! Sink your teeth into a juicy black angus beef patty, paired with melty cheese, crisp iceberg lettuce, sliced plump tomatoes, red onions, and tangy pickles, all sandwiched between a perfectly toasted potato bun. Drizzled with our signature silky sauce, each bite is a symphony of flavors that will leave your taste buds craving for more. Elevate your burger game and order the Super Smash Burger today!

hasMenuItem.name: Double Smash Burger
hasMenuItem.description: Get ready for double the thrill with our irresistible Super Smash Burger. Stacked with two juicy beef patties and double the cheese, this burger is designed to satiate even the fiercest hunger.

hasMenuItem.name: Super Punched Fries
hasMenuItem.description:
Crispy, golden, and perfect solo or as a sidekick to our epic burgers!
Power up your taste buds and enjoy the ride!

Our Super Punched Fries are GLUTEN FREE, fried in a gluten free frier!

hasMenuItem.name: Mushroom Kingdom Melt Combo
hasMenuItem.description: Savour our signature Black Angus Chuck and Brisket patty topped with sauteed mushrooms, caramelized onions, and Swiss cheese on a toasted potato bun. A real game-changer in taste!

hasMenuItem.name: Crispy Chicken Burger Combo
hasMenuItem.description:
Embark on a savory expedition with our Crispy Chicken Sandwich, available in three mouth-watering variations: Classic Plain, Fiery Nashville Hot, and Smoky Carolina BBQ. Each sandwich is gloriously crowned with creamy roasted garlic aioli, crispy lettuce, and tangy pickles, served on a perfectly toasted potato bun.

Relish this gourmet experience with a side of our epic, golden-brown French fries. Fancy a different sidekick? Upgrade your fries to crispy onion rings, our addictive shaking gems, or poutine.

hasMenuItem.name: Triple Smash Burger
hasMenuItem.description: Embrace the challenge with a triple-layer of beef and cheese, creating the legendary Super Smash Burger experience.

hasMenuItem.name: Crispy Chicken Burger Combo Nashville Hot
hasMenuItem.description:

Relish this gourmet experience with a side of our epic, golden-brown French fries. Fancy a different sidekick? Upgrade your fries to crispy onion rings, our addictive shaking gems, or poutine.

hasMenuItem.name: Leafeon Burger
hasMenuItem.description: Savor the plant-based goodness of our delectable smashed Impossible patty, SSB burger sauce, lettuce, tomato, onion, all presented on a toasted Martin’s Famous Bakery potato bun.

hasMenuItem.name: Halal - Super Smash Burger
hasMenuItem.description: Get ready to indulge in the ultimate culinary delight with our Halal Super Smash Burger! Sink your teeth into a juicy halal beef patty topped with mouth-watering ingredients that will tantalize your taste buds. Rest assured with our halal certification, savor every bite knowing it meets the highest standards. Don't miss out on this savory experience – order your Halal Super Smash Burger now and treat yourself to a burst of flavors!

hasMenuItem.name: Halal - Triple Smash Burger
hasMenuItem.description: Get ready to indulge in the ultimate culinary delight with our Halal Super Smash Burger! Sink your teeth into a juicy triple stack of halal beef patties topped sliced cheddar cheese, with crisp lettuce, tomatoes, tangy pickles, sliced red onion, and our delectable SSB Sauce. Rest assured with our halal certification, savor every bite knowing it meets the highest standards. Don't miss out on this savory experience – order your Halal Super Smash Burger now and treat yourself to a burst of flavors!

hasMenuItem.name: Do Good Things Burger Combo
hasMenuItem.description:
Savor the taste of summer with our Summer Solstice Burger at Super Smash Burgers! This special creation features a perfectly smashed patty, fresh seasonal vegetables, and a homemade secret sauce, all tucked inside a soft, toasted brioche bun. It's not just a burger; it's a celebration of summer on a plate!

But that's not all! With each purchase of the Summer Solstice Burger, you are also supporting a very important cause. A portion of the proceeds from each burger sold goes to Qmunity, a non-profit organization that provides a safer space for LGBTQ2S+ people. 

Upgrade your fries to onion rings, shaking gems, or poutine. Quench your thirst with a frosty can of pop. Enjoy!

review.reviewBody:
Hands down the best burgers in Vancouver!
Always packed with care, nice and hot and always so tasty!
We pick up sometimes and the staff are always so helpful!
Best burgers in town. Totally worth it. Always awesome. Even remade my order once when the driver took too long to pick up. Reminder: Tip the kitchen staff!!
Hello, where is my roasted garlic aloli? I paid $1.65+tax+delivery....The food I got are delicious. But I do not like to pay for what I did not get.
Amazing food!! Love the chicken wings! The Crispy Chicken Burger Combo is so yummy! Fresh ingredients and unreal flavours!!!
Super Smash is my favourite place to get burgers in Vancouver. As someone with celiac disease, I know they will prepare my order safely.
